section.title: Obtaining the Libraries
section.p:
Source and binary distributions for both the Java and C++ libraries are available from from the
XML project site only. Current distributions are not available from the mirrors.

section.title: Validating Distribution Signatures
section.p:
All distributions are provided with signature .asc files. These contain PGP signatures for the related distribution. You should validate these using the keys found in the
key file downloaded from the Apache site.
section.source: % pgpk -a KEYS % pgpv xml-security-bin-1_4_2.zip.asc or % pgp -ka KEYS % pgp xml-security-bin-1_4_2.zip.asc or % gpg --import KEYS % gpg --verify xml-security-bin-1_4_2.zip.asc

section.title: SVN Download
section.p: For the adventurous, this project's SVN repository can be checked out through anonymous SVN with the following instruction set.
This will check out the code into a subdirectory named "xml-security". The checkout will contain both the Java and the C++ source.
